Table 1. National estimates of allegations of sexual victimization, by type of facility, 2005 and 2010–15
Type of facility
Prisons/a
Jails/c
Other adult facilities
Note: Excludes inmate-on-inmate sexual harassment. See appendix table 3 for standard errors.
*Comparison year.

†Difference with comparison year is significant at the 95% confidence level. Federal prisons, state prisons, military facilities and ICE facilities are complete enumerations rather than a sample, so any difference with comparison year is significant. See footnote b for one exception.
^Too few cases to provide a reliable estimate.
a/Includes federal, state, and private prisons.
b/Estimates for federal prisons in 2005 are not comparable to those for other years due to a change in reporting.
c/Includes local and private jails.
d/Excludes facilities housing only juveniles.
Source: Bureau of Justice Statistics, Survey of Sexual Victimization, 2005 and 2010–15.
